section.title: Description
section.p: [US Standard Certificate Of Death Fields 13a - c]. Identifies the person who informed the authorities of the decedent's death.

stentry.p: [US Standard Certificate Of Death Fields 13c]. The mailing address of the person who informed the authorities of the decedent's death.
[US Standard Certificate Of Death Fields 13a]. The legal name of the person who informed the authorities of the decedent's death.
[US Standard Certificate Of Death Fields 13b]. Specifies the relationship between the person who informed the authorities of the decedent's death to the decedent.
A pointer to the Person record of the informant, where name and address information may be obtained.
